Treatment: Oral ISMN (MR) OR oral captopril OR IV magnesium
Brief summary:: Captopril shows benefit post-MI within 5 weeks, no nitrate/magnesium benefit

Format: Multicenter, open label, 2x2 factorial design, randomized trial
Primary endpoint: Mortality at 6 weeks; Composite of (death CHF LVEF >35% < 45% akinesis/dyskinesis)
Brief summary:: Lisinopril reduced mortality within 24h of AMI. No benefit from GTN.

Primary endpoint: Time to death from any cause
Brief summary:: First trial to show benefits of aldosterone antagonists after acute MI with CCF

Format: Multicenter, double-blinded, two-by-two factorial, randomized, placebo-controlled trial
Brief summary:: Early evidence for aspirin and thrombolysis
